content: 2 double_crochet around change to color b at the end of the row slip_stitch to join with color b 72 *cut color a here make sure to leave a long enough tail to weave in round 10 chain 2 double_crochet around slip_stitch to join 72 round 11 chain 2 2 double_crochet in same st for the first cluster skip 1 st *2 double_crochet cluster skip 1 st* repeat around slip_stitch to join 36 clusters 72 sts round 12-13 chain 2 2 double_crochet cluster in each double_crochet cluster from previous round slip_stitch to join 36 clusters 72 sts round 14 chain 2 double_crochet around change to color a at the end of the row slip_stitch to join with color a 72 *cut color b here make sure to leave a long enough tail to weave in round 15-17 chain 2 double_crochet around slip_stitch to join 72 no ear flaps round 18 chain 2 double_crochet around change to color b at the end of the row slip_stitch to join with color b 72 *cut color a here make sure to leave a long enough tail to weave in
